title: Amazing Garlic Chicken Livers
directions: Heat a skillet over medium heat. Cook and stir livers in the hot skillet until cooked through, 3 to 5 minutes. Add olive oil, lemon juice, and salt to livers; gently stir until mixed. Remove skillet from heat and sprinkle garlic over livers.
ingredients: 1 pound chicken livers - rinsed, trimmed, and patted dry
½ teaspoon salt, or to taste
